purposeful & delightful forms

What personality is your form?

Your form is your front of house, it's the first digital experience your public have with you.

A well designed form is like a fantastic maître d'. It'll make you feel welcome, get to know you just enough to ensure you get exactly what you came for, and remember to return your jacket on the way out

Imagine if your forms were optimised, what efficiency and time gains you and your customers would all instantly acquire, not to mention how many trees would be saved, and more. High fives all round.

Tell us about your form

Forms are a bit like people. They come in all shapes and sizes, have varying ages and unique histories. And like people, forms transfer information from one end to another, leaving an impression behind. This impression has the potential to be one that delights you and makes you feel good about the world.

But all too often, our interactions with forms are unnecessarily confusing and full of frustration. We want to hear about the characteristics of forms in your agency, or forms that you have used.
